topics.title: Game Element
topics.string:
The game element defines the game itself. The main feature of the game is the
enter_message

This displays the game's initial message, as well as other game-level item.


Below is a game element example:

---

{key=game
    name=Dark World
    type=game
    parent=root

    {type=enter_message
        output={@

        }
    }

    {key=die_message
        output={@
You have died.
        }
    }
}
